title: Antigravity vs Core ML: Which AI Tool is Better in 2025?
metaDescription: Compare Antigravity vs Core ML. See pricing, features, pros & cons to choose the best AI tool for your needs in 2025.
introduction: Choosing between Antigravity and Core ML? These AI tools serve different but sometimes overlapping purposes, each with unique strengths. This comparison breaks down the key differences to help you decide.

sections.title: Overview: Antigravity vs Core ML
paragraphs: Antigravity (developer tools) is Antigravity is a revolutionary multi-agent AI code editor that debuted at #1 in December 2025 developer rankings. Completely free during preview, it features unique multi-agent orchestration where multiple AI agents collaborate on complex coding tasks, integrated Chrome browser automation for testing, and support for the latest models (Gemini 3 Pro, Claude Sonnet 4.5/Opus 4.5). Its key differentiator is multi-agent collaboration—a capability no competitor offers—enabling it to tackle complex projects autonomously.. It's known for code-editor, ai-agents, multi-agent.

Core ML (ml frameworks) is Core ML is Apple's proprietary machine learning framework designed to enable developers to integrate trained machine learning models directly into applications running on iOS, macOS, watchOS, and tvOS. Its key capability is performing fast, on-device inference, leveraging Apple's hardware accelerators (Neural Engine, GPU, CPU) for optimal performance while ensuring user data privacy by keeping processing local. It is unique for its seamless integration with the Apple ecosystem, providing a standardized format (.mlmodel) and tools that simplify the deployment of models from popular training frameworks like TensorFlow and PyTorch.. Users choose it for apple, on-device-ai, ios-development.

sections.title: Key Features
paragraphs: Antigravity: Multi-agent orchestration (unique feature), Integrated Chrome browser automation, Live preview and design-to-code

Core ML: On-device inference with no network requirement for model execution, Hardware acceleration via Apple Neural Engine, GPU, and CPU, Support for a wide range of model types (vision, NLP, audio, tabular data)

verdict: Both Antigravity and Core ML are excellent AI tools. Your choice depends on specific needs: Antigravity for code-editor, Core ML for apple.
